5861.verse: إِذَا|When|57|82|1370$تُتْلَىٰ|are recited|92|141|3123$عَلَيْهِ|to him|64|113|395$ءَايَـٰتُنَا|Our Verses,|97|146|7237$قَالَ|he says,|76|125|309$أَسَـٰطِيرُ|`Stories|94|118|5506$ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ|(of) the former (people).`|192|192|5507$

5864.verse: ثُمَّ|Then|53|97|293$إِنَّهُمْ|indeed, they|103|191|106$لَصَالُواْ|(surely) will burn|130|218|17955$ٱلْجَحِيمِ|(in) the Hellfire.|124|168|1107$

5873.verse: يُسْقَوْنَ|They will be given to drink|194|236|17960$مِن|of|50|134|53$رَّحِيقٍ|a pure wine|97|181|17961$مَّخْتُومٍ|sealed,|83|125|17962$

5874.verse: خِتَـٰمُهُۥ|Its seal|92|101|17963$مِسْكٌ‌ۚ|(will be of) musk.|134|152|17964$وَفِى|And for|68|86|487$ذَٲلِكَ|that|64|82|28$فَلْيَتَنَافَسِ|let aspire|102|120|17965$ٱلْمُتَنَـٰفِسُونَ|the aspirers.|126|135|17966$

5876.verse: عَيْنًا|A spring,|78|127|573$يَشْرَبُ|will drink|84|182|17646$بِهَا|from it,|68|166|1203$ٱلْمُقَرَّبُونَ|those brought near.|152|201|4678$

5878.verse: وَإِذَا|And when|85|118|96$مَرُّواْ|they passed|101|168|12855$بِهِمْ|by them,|79|146|125$يَتَغَامَزُونَ|they winked at one another.|209|242|17969$

5880.verse: وَإِذَا|And when|85|119|96$رَأَوْهُمْ|they saw them,|124|192|17972$قَالُوٓاْ|they said,|86|154|101$إِنَّ|`Indeed,|78|146|58$هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ|these|82|116|335$لَضَآلُّونَ|surely have gone astray.`|193|193|17187$

5881.verse: وَمَآ|But not|69|110|46$أُرْسِلُواْ|they had been sent|150|233|17973$عَلَيْهِمْ|over them|87|170|22$حَـٰفِظِينَ|(as) guardians.|120|162|9209$

5882.verse: fa{loyawoma⚓So today⚓T|LEM:yawom|ROOT:ywm|M|ACC★{l~a*iyna⚓those who⚓ REL|LEM:{l~a*iY|MP★'aAmanuwA@⚓believed -⚓ V|PERF|(IV)|LEM:'aAmana|ROOT:Amn|3MP★mina⚓at⚓ P|LEM:min★{lokuf~aAri⚓the disbelievers⚓ N|LEM:kaAfir|ROOT:kfr|MP|GEN★yaDoHakuwna⚓they will laugh,⚓ V|IMPF|LEM:DaHikato|ROOT:DHk|3MP★

5855.verse: No! Indeed, the record of the wicked is in sijjeen.

5856.verse: And what can make you know what is sijjeen?

5857.verse: It is [their destination recorded in] a register inscribed.

5858.verse: Woe, that Day, to the deniers,

5859.verse: Who deny the Day of Recompense.

5860.verse: And none deny it except every sinful transgressor.

5861.verse: When Our verses are recited to him, he says, "Legends of the former peoples."

5862.verse: No! Rather, the stain has covered their hearts of that which they were earning.

5863.verse: No! Indeed, from their Lord, that Day, they will be partitioned.

5864.verse: Then indeed, they will [enter and] burn in Hellfire.

5865.verse: Then it will be said [to them], "This is what you used to deny."

5866.verse: No! Indeed, the record of the righteous is in 'illiyyun.

5867.verse: And what can make you know what is 'illiyyun?

5868.verse: It is [their destination recorded in] a register inscribed

5869.verse: Which is witnessed by those brought near [to Allah].

5870.verse: Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure

5872.verse: You will recognize in their faces the radiance of pleasure.

5873.verse: They will be given to drink [pure] wine [which was] sealed.

5874.verse: The last of it is musk. So for this let the competitors compete.

5875.verse: And its mixture is of Tasneem,

5876.verse: A spring from which those near [to Allah] drink.

5877.verse: Indeed, those who committed crimes used to laugh at those who believed.

5878.verse: And when they passed by them, they would exchange derisive glances.

5879.verse: And when they returned to their people, they would return jesting.

5880.verse: And when they saw them, they would say, "Indeed, those are truly lost."

5881.verse: But they had not been sent as guardians over them.

5882.verse: So Today those who believed are laughing at the disbelievers,
